summary: In 1947, following the U.N. decision to split British Palestine into separate Jewish and Palestinian states, a former U.S. Army officer is recruited by the Jews to reorganize the Haganah.
cast: Kirk Douglas|Senta Berger|Angie Dickinson|James Donald|Stathis Giallelis|Luther Adler|Topol|Ruth White|Gordon Jackson|Michael Hordern|Allan Cuthbertson|Jeremy Kemp|Sean Barrett|Michael Shillo|Rina Ganor|Roland Bartrop|Robert Gardett|Michael Balston|Claude Aliotti|Samra Dedes|Micha Shagrir|Frank Latimore|Ken Buckle|Rod Dana|Robert Ross|Arthur Hansel|Dan Sturkie|Hillel Rave|Shlomo Hermon|Frank Sinatra|Yul Brynner|John Wayne|Vera Dolen|Gary Merrill|Winston Churchill|Michael Douglas|Yehuda Efroni|Rudolf Hess|Fiorello LaGuardia|Geoffrey Palmer|Danny Perlman|Franklin D. Roosevelt|Jimmy Shaw|Joseph Stalin
title: La sombra de un gigante
